channel.title: Gamerz Ignited (hiring) Programmers, Web Developers, Gfx Designers, Need STAFF!
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape this is Mattredd9395 founder of the Gamerz Ignited we are lookng for Programmers, Web developers, Gfx designers to be part of the Gamerz Ignited gaming community. Fr3dde and i are hiring people by monthly and paying by pay pal, but we are also paying out by (Gold) Runescape gold or any other game. Gamerz Ignited is a gaming community that well be making many different games to provide for you game lovers. Fr3dde and i are really looking forward for you to work for us thanks Moparscape for your time
Kind Re-guards Mattredd9395, Fr3dde (Founder's of Gamerz Ignited)
Please contact us on Skype, or Gamerz Ignited Website:[url=http://www.gamerzignited.enjin.com/contact]http://www.gamerzignited.com/application[/url]
Skype: Mattredd9395
